title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1223/78 of 7 June 1978 amending Regulation (EEC) No 723/78 concerning promotional, publicity and market research measures within the Community in respect of milk and milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1223/78  of 7 June 1978  amending Regulation (EEC) No 723/78 concerning promotional, publicity and market research measures within the Community in respect of milk and milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
With effect from 1 June 1978, Article 4 (2) and (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 723/78 is hereby amended to read as follows:
"2. The complete proposals shall reach the intervention agency before 1 August 1978.
3. Where there is a failure to comply with the said date, the relevant proposal shall be considered to be null and void."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 June 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 131, 26.5.1977, p. 6. (2)OJ No L 130, 18.5.1978, p. 11. (3)OJ No L 98, 11.4.1978, p. 5. (4)OJ No L 108, 22.4.1978, p. 25.
